thread.title: Boy Who Set Fire at Protest Turned Out To Be Drew Carey’s Son
thread.title_full: Boy Who Set Fire at Protest Turned Out To Be Drew Carey’s Son

author: Gabrielle Cintorino
title: Boy Who Set Fire at Protest Turned Out To Be Drew Carey’s Son
text:
PHOTO: Wounded Warrior Slaps Down Meryl Streep… Posts 1 Pic That DESTROYS Her 
As previously reported, pre-inauguration and Inauguration Day protests against Trump turned violent in many cases. 
Despite the dangers involved in the protest, Drew Carey let his child join the protests when his boy expressed interest in seeing the demonstrations. 
The elder Carey was in the neighborhood to have dinner, according to BizPac Review . He reportedly said there was no danger and “nothing going on” while his son started a fire nearby. Advertisement - story continues below 
You can see the clip here: 
After the footage of his son aired on national television, Carey admitted that he had to speak with the boy regarding his decisions. 
While he was in town to host the Veterans Inaugural Ball, Carey refrained from saying whom he voted for, simply saying, “I didn’t vote for either (Trump or Democrat nominee Hillary Clinton).” Advertisement - story continues below
